data.name: InvalidSourceExceptionMessage
data.value: No source matches the given value: {0}
data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - The name of the source that was not found.

data.name: FindPackagesExceptionMessage
data.value: An error occurred while searching for packages: {0}
data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - A string representation of the error status returned by the catalog.

data.name: ProgressRecordActivityInstalling
data.value: Installing '{0}'
data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - The name of the package being installed.

data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - The name of the package being updated.

data.name: CatalogConnectExceptionMessage
data.value: An error occurred while connecting to the catalog.

data.name: InvalidVersionExceptionMessage
data.value: No versions matched the given value: {0}
data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - The version string provided by the user.

data.name: NoPackageFoundExceptionMessage
data.value: No packages matched the given input criteria.

data.name: VagueCriteriaExceptionMessage
data.value: {0}, {1}, and {2} other packages matched the input criteria. Please refine the input.
data.comment: {Locked="{0}","{1}","{2}"} {0} - The first conflicting package as a string. {1} - The second conflicting package. {2} - The number of other packages that also matched the input criteria.

data.name: IntegrityUnknownMessage
data.value: Unable to execute winget command.

data.name: WinGetCLIExceptionMessage
data.value: Winget command '{0}' with parameters '{1}' failed with exit code '{2}'.
data.comment: {Locked="{0}","{1}","{2}"} {0} - The winget command executed. {1} - The parameters of the command. {2} - The exit code.

data.name: UserSettingsReadException
data.value: User settings file is invalid.

data.name: IntegrityAppExecutionAliasDisabledMessage
data.value: The App Execution Alias for the Windows Package Manager is disabled.

data.name: IntegrityAppInstallerNotInstalledMessage
data.value: The App Installer is not installed.

data.name: IntegrityAppInstallerNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The App Installer does not contain the Windows Package Manager.

data.name: IntegrityFailureMessage
data.value: Windows Package Manager returned an unexcepted result.

data.name: IntegrityNotInPathMessage
data.value: The App Installer did not automatically add the PATH environment variable.

data.name: IntegrityOsNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The Windows Package Manager requires Windows Version 1809 (October 2018 Update) or later.

data.name: WinGetCLITimeoutExceptionMessage
data.value: Winget command timed out: {0} {1}
data.comment: {Locked="{0}","{1}"} {0} - The winget command executed. {1} - The parameters of the command.

data.name: IntegrityAppInstallerNotRegisteredMessage
data.value: The App Installer is not registered.

data.name: RepairAppExecutionAliasMessage
data.value: The App Execution Alias for the Windows Package Manager is disabled. You should enable the App Execution Alias for the Windows Package Manager. Go to App execution aliases option in Apps & features Settings to enable it.

data.name: IntegrityUnexpectedVersionMessage
data.value: The installed winget version doesn't match the expectation. Installer version '{0}' Expected version '{1}'
data.comment: {Locked="{0}","{1}"} {0} - The winget current installed winget version. {1} - The expected winget version.

data.name: SingleThreadedApartmentNotSupportedMessage
data.value: Single threaded apartment (STA) is not currently supported in this context; run PowerShell in Multi-threaded apartment mode (MTA).

data.name: WindowsPowerShellNotSupported
data.value: This cmdlet is not supported in Windows PowerShell.

data.name: IntegrityAppInstallerLicense
data.value: No applicable license found.

data.name: RepairAllUsersHelpMessage
data.value: Try running with -AllUsers in administrator mode.

data.name: RepairAllUsersMessage
data.value: -AllUsers requires administrator mode.

data.name: RepairFailureMessage

data.name: RequiresAdminMessage
data.value: This cmdlet requires administrator privileges to execute.

data.value: The installer technology in use does not match the version currently installed.

data.name: RepairerFailure

data.comment: {Locked="{0}"} {0} - The error code of the repairer.

data.name: RepairOperationNotSupported

data.name: NoAdminRepairForUserScopePackage
data.value: Repair operations involving administrator privileges are not permitted on packages installed within the user scope.

data.name: UnknownRepairFailure
